description: Validate creation of a passenger list with valid passenger types
test_steps: Create a PaxList object with ADTs, CHDs, GBEs, and INFs.
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns a success response.
expected_result: Success response with valid passenger list

description: Validate unique PaxID for each passenger
test_steps: Create a PaxList object with duplicate PaxIDs.
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns an error response indicating duplicate PaxID.
Create a PaxList object with valid PTC codes (ADT, CHD, GBE, INF).
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns a success response.
expected_result: Success response with valid passenger list

test_steps: Create a PaxList object with invalid PTC codes (e.g., XYZ).
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns an error response indicating invalid PTC code.
expected_result: Error response with 'invalid PTC code' message

description: Validate maximum one infant per adult
test_steps: Create a PaxList object with two infants associated with one adult.
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns an error response indicating maximum one infant per adult.
expected_result: Error response with 'maximum one infant per adult' message

description: Validate at least one adult in the passenger list
test_steps: Create a PaxList object with only children and infants.
Submit the PaxList object to the NDC API.
Verify the API returns an error response indicating at least one adult required.
expected_result: Error response with 'at least one adult required' message
